title: KOMET Project - Open Metadata Evaluation Report
description:
Data reports evaluating the contributions of the KOMET project (Kollaborative Anreicherung der Metadatenallmende zur Förderung eines diversen Open-Access-Ökosystems) to the open metadata commons. The project develops OJS plugins that enable Open Access journals to contribute citation and geospatial metadata to open knowledge bases like OpenCitations and Wikidata. This repository tracks and visualizes these contributions over time.

Contents of this deposition:

  • Source code: komet_evaluation.ipynb – Jupyter notebook with analysis code and narrative
  • Data files:
    • komet_report_data.json – Current metrics snapshot
    • komet_timeline.json – Historical time series data
  • Rendered reports:
    • docs/komet_report.pdf – PDF report for offline reading
    • Interactive HTML report (online)

Source repository: github.com/GeoinformationSystems/komet-report
